Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:37:59 UTC – Details)



7 in1 Edge Trimming Squeegee: The squeegee set has 14 ends with different shapes, which fit for any edge of your car, such as headlight, Bumper, car doors handle, Car center-console. CARTINTS brand edge trimming squeegee will help you complete vinyl film wrapping in narrow corners.
4 Inches Felt Edge Squeegee: Made of soft plastic, strong enough to improve the efficiency of smoothing vinyl film. Microfiber felt edge squeegee will not leave any scratches or marks on the thin self-adhesive paper.
Vinyl Wrap Cutter And 9mm Knife Blade: The razor cutter is safe enough for you to cut off vinyl film roll because its blade is hidden inside. The retractable 9 mm knife is the best to trim the excess vinyl film or cut the size you want. Snap off blade will miantain long time best cutting performance.
Vinyl Wrap Magnets and Work Gloves: You can use the vinyl magnet tool to hold the large vinyl film paper so that you can free your hands to finish the details from smoothing to trimming.Work gloves is the key tool to prevent hands injury, or the damages of vinyl wrap paper.
Package: 7 x blue hard edge-trimming squeegee, 2x blue felt squeegee, 2 x vinyl wrap magnet holder,1 x 9mm utility knife,10 x blades,5 x squeegee felts replacement,1 x safe red cutter, 1x black work gloves

INSANELY STICKY – Tired of tape that doesn’t hold? Our athletic tape sticks have strong adhesive like it should. PERFECT on bats, Lacrosse sticks, hockey sticks. Tough enough to last through an entire exercise workout.

Agalmatolite Bracelet

There has many different designs leather wrap bracelets, and they are certainly a popular fashion accessory for daily life. Both men and women enjoy wearing this accessory since it can be customized into either very feminine or masculine style. Most of the bracelets can be designed either single, double, triple or 5 layers wrap which wrapped around on your wrist. For persons that wish to have a more outgoing look, mix and match with different wraps and designs is definitely a fantastic choice. Inspired from natural beauty and vitality, hope this accessories can bring more energy and increase your love for life.

Model Show

This bracelet is made with genuine gemstones. Variations and inclusions in natural stones are expected and only enhance their beauty. You will receive one of the exact bracelets shown in the pictures.

The most special and charming of natural stone jewelry is they are different of each piece, with the unique texture, like all of us are the unique one in the world.

Gemstone Energy

At Energy Muse, our gemstones and crystals have healing properties that help to balance the body, mind, and spirit. Healing crystals and gemstones have been used for thousands of years by ancient civilizations; the Egyptians, Aztecs, and others incorporated healing stones into jewelry, cosmetics, decorative statues, amulets, and much more–a testament to the powerful ability of gemstones to release mental, physical, and spiritual blockages.

How to Wear Plumiss Wrap Bracelet

you can loose the knot on the end , then retie it depend on your wrist size, then cut the extra part. If the one you bought is vegan rope design, finish it off by burning the end of the thread to prevent fraying
